paragraphs.content: And he shewed me Joshua the high priest standing before the angel of the LORD, and Satan standing at his right hand to resist him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he shewed me Joshua the high priest standing before the angel of the Lord, and Satan standing at his right hand to resist him.

paragraphs.content: And the LORD said unto Satan, The LORD rebuke thee, O Satan; even the LORD that hath chosen Jerusalem rebuke thee: is not this a brand plucked out of the fire?
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Lord said unto Satan, The Lord rebuke thee, O Satan; even the Lord that hath chosen Jerusalem rebuke thee: is not this a brand plucked out of the fire?

paragraphs.content: Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and stood before the angel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and stood before the angel.

paragraphs.content: And he answered and spake unto those that stood before him, saying, Take away the filthy garments from him. And unto him he said, Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he answered and spake unto those that stood before him, saying, Take away the filthy garments from him. And unto him he said, Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.

paragraphs.content: And I said, Let them set a fair mitre upon his head. So they set a fair mitre upon his head, and clothed him with garments. And the angel of the LORD stood by.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I said, Let them set a fair mitre upon his head. So they set a fair mitre upon his head, and clothed him with garments. And the angel of the Lord stood by.

paragraphs.content: And the angel of the LORD protested unto Joshua, saying,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the angel of the Lord protested unto Joshua, saying,

paragraphs.content: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; If thou wilt walk in my ways, and if thou wilt keep my charge, then thou shalt also judge my house, and shalt also keep my courts, and I will give thee places to walk among these that stand by.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thus saith the Lord of hosts; If thou wilt walk in my ways, and if thou wilt keep my charge, then thou shalt also judge my house, and shalt also keep my courts, and I will give thee places to walk among these that stand by.

paragraphs.content: Hear now, O Joshua the high priest, thou, and thy fellows that sit before thee: for they are men wondered at: for, behold, I will bring forth my servant the BRANCH.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear now, O Joshua the high priest, thou, and thy fellows that sit before thee: for they are men wondered at: for, behold, I will bring forth my servant the Branch.

paragraphs.content: For behold the stone that I have laid before Joshua; upon one stone shall be seven eyes: behold, I will engrave the graving thereof, saith the LORD of hosts, and I will remove the iniquity of that land in one day.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For behold the stone that I have laid before Joshua; upon one stone shall be seven eyes: behold, I will engrave the graving thereof, saith the Lord of hosts, and I will remove the iniquity of that land in one day.

paragraphs.content: In that day, saith the LORD of hosts, shall ye call every man his neighbour under the vine and under the fig tree.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In that day, saith the Lord of hosts, shall ye call every man his neighbour under the vine and under the fig tree.
